TopicTitle: So is it still too early for...

Articles.Content:
The hype train?

http://forum.unity3d.com/threads/unity-5-0-release-candidate-1-is-available.296875/

Cuz I'm pretty sure they're fueling it right now.

The 1.0 hypetrain? Yeah, too early, not until Experimentals. For Unity 5? We should start thinking about getting tickets.

EDIT: Oh! And welcome to the forums!

Edited February 13, 2015 by Thomas988
I don't even grammar

I wonder when we'll get an official statement from the devs as to what their plans are for Unity 5? I know Harv mentioned that they weren't really looking at it until 1.0 is released, but that was back when it was still unreleased. Will the devs change their plans? Perhaps release a 0.90.1, like we got with 0.18.4?

EDIT: Yes, welcome to the forums! May your stay here be long and prosperous.
1.0 is already a really ambitious update. I doubt they would want to throw a major game engine change into that mix.
Perhaps a hype smartcar would be applicable? Or a hype moped?

I wonder when we'll get an official statement from the devs as to what their plans are for Unity 5? I know Harv mentioned that they weren't really looking at it until 1.0 is released, but that was back when it was still unreleased. Will the devs change their plans? Perhaps release a 0.90.1, like we got with 0.18.4?

I mean, the devs had said multiple times over the months that once Unity 5 comes out they would drop everything and work with everything they got to port KSP over to the new version. Of course, I always thought that would come out after 1.0, so I'm not too sure if they'd put development to a halt right now.

Far too early.

Given the feature list, they'll have to work rather hard to get 1.0 out by the end of this year.
